Class TimeSteward

java.lang.Object
us.mn.state.dot.sched.TimeSteward
public final class TimeSteward extends Object
The time steward provides static methods dealing with time sources. To use this class correctly, there are several standard library methods which must be avoided (or used only carefully).
Author:
Douglas Lau
